baseline._comment: Allows for payoff to be contextualised by real data
baseline._comment_environment: The environment (hider) in which the baseline data is taken

sRandomWalkLowGas._comment_data: Non-winter month health utilisation by low SEC with asthma
sRandomWalkLowGas._comment_payoff: Payoff received when simulating the same environment (non-winter) for the same individuals (low SEC with asthma)

sRandomWalkMediumGas._comment_data: Non-winter month health utilisation by middle SEC with asthma
sRandomWalkMediumGas._comment_payoff: Payoff received when simulating the same environment (non-winter) for the same individuals (middle SEC with asthma)

sRandomWalkHighGas._comment_data: Non-winter month health utilisation by high SEC with asthma
sRandomWalkHighGas._comment_payoff: Payoff received when simulating the same environment (non-winter) for the same individuals (high SEC with asthma)
